title: AuthMe插件怎么禁止其他国家的加入
author: minecraft小器
txt_content:
请看清题目 AuthMe插件怎么禁止其他国家的加入
就是只能在中国玩服务器，其他全部弄不要！

这个是插件文档

Protection:
    # Enable some servers protection (country based login, antibot)
    enableProtection: false
    # Apply the protection also to registered usernames
    enableProtectionRegistered: true
    # Countries allowed to join the server and register. For country codes, see
    # http://dev.maxmind.com/geoip/legacy/codes/iso3166/
    # PLEASE USE QUOTES!
    countries: 
    - 'US'
    - 'GB'
    - 'LOCALHOST'
    # Countries not allowed to join the server and register
    # PLEASE USE QUOTES!
    countriesBlacklist: 
    - 'A1'
    # Do we need to enable automatic antibot system?
    enableAntiBot: false
    # The interval in seconds
    antiBotInterval: 5
    # Max number of players allowed to login in the interval
    # before the AntiBot system is enabled automatically
    antiBotSensibility: 10
    # Duration in minutes of the antibot automatic system
    antiBotDuration: 10
    # Delay in seconds before the antibot activation
    antiBotDelay: 60



如果还分香港和台湾，请把香港和台湾的字母告诉我，有必要我会加进去

replies.author: AzureHanChen
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 AzureHanChen 于 2019-12-7 21:01 编辑 

您好,请先保证Authme为最新版本
然后将enableProtection: false复制代码改为
enableProtection: true复制代码把以下代码替换你配置文件中的代码
    countries: 
    - CN
    - HK
    - TW
    - MO
    - LOCALHOST复制代码如果我的回复帮到了您,请为我设置最佳答案
如果您还抱有疑问,欢迎追问
补充: 请开启bc中的ip_forward功能,否则无法传给子服玩家的真实IP

还有CN不是中国吗？

replies.author: AzureHanChen
replies.txt_content:
minecraft小器 发表于 2019-12-7 21:17
请问能在我上面的插件文档修改吗？

Protection:
    # Enable some servers protection (country based login, antibot)
    enableProtection: true
    # Apply the protection also to registered usernames
    enableProtectionRegistered: true
    # Countries allowed to join the server and register. For country codes, see
    # http://dev.maxmind.com/geoip/legacy/codes/iso3166/
    # PLEASE USE QUOTES!
    countries:
    - 'CN'
    - 'MO'
    - 'HK'
    - 'TW'
    # Countries not allowed to join the server and register
    # PLEASE USE QUOTES!
    countriesBlacklist:
    - 'A1'
    # Do we need to enable automatic antibot system?
    enableAntiBot: false
    # The interval in seconds
    antiBotInterval: 5
    # Max number of players allowed to login in the interval
    # before the AntiBot system is enabled automatically
    antiBotSensibility: 10
    # Duration in minutes of the antibot automatic system
    antiBotDuration: 10
    # Delay in seconds before the antibot activation
    antiBotDelay: 60复制代码
CN: 中国大陆,HK: 中国香港,MO: 中国澳门,TW,中国台湾
CN不包括后面几个,具体因为什么,我就不方便说了
还有就是,搬运贴中有错误 并且搬运贴中给出的地址已经失效

那为什么我之前没有带CN能进？

您好,您必须开启ip_forward功能
(好像是叫作ip_forward,反正能返回玩家真实IP的在BC中选项)
并且照例在countries下添加LOCALHOST

replies.author: 贫民窟
replies.txt_content:
enableProtection: false

改为false
  countriesBlacklist:
  - A1

改成
  countriesBlacklist: []
